DOC.brief_title: Does Self-myofascial Release With Foam Roll Change Pressure Pain Thresholds Lower Extremity Muscles
DOC.detailed_description: To date , study examine foam rolling effect PPT ipsilateral antagonist contralateral muscle . There gap literature regard knowledge effect foam roll muscle . This first study examine acute effect foam roll intervention ipsilateral antagonist contralateral muscle group PPT . Forty-five ( N=45 ) healthy adult ( 18-65 year ) California State University Dominguez Hills ( CSUDH ) recruit study via convenience sampling . Data collection take place CSUDH sport medicine laboratory . Prior test , participant fill screen questionnaire question represent exclusion criterion use determine ineligibility study . Prior participant recruitment enrollment , pilot study do 10 participant establish rater reliability use method mention . After acceptable reliability achieve , recruitment enrollment continue . Participants meet inclusion criterion consent participate enrol study . Participants read sign CSUDH approve consent form prior begin data collection . Following consent , participant also fill questionnaire provide demographic information include age , height , weight . Following completion paperwork , participant undergo test conduct hour 10am 2pm . Each data collection session last approximately 10 minute . Pressure pain threshold ( PPT ) measure use digital algometer ipsilateral leave quadriceps , leave hamstring , right quadriceps muscle group . All subject follow 2-minute video-guided foam roll intervention leave quadriceps use rigid foam roll outer foam cover . The data collection process follow : 1 . Pretest measure ( subject stand ) : PPT ipsilateral leave quadriceps , leave hamstring right quadriceps group ( subject stand test ) 2 . Intervention : 2-minute video-guided foam roll intervention use rigid foam roller . 3 . Posttest measure ( subject stand ) : PPT ipsilateral leave quadriceps , leave hamstring , right quadriceps group . Collected data transfer SPSS v.22 ( IBM SPSS , Chicago , IL ) . Means , standard deviation , 95 % confidence interval ( 95 % CI ) , range participant descriptive data calculate . Pressure pain threshold pretest posttest difference calculate use pair t-test The p-value consider significant .05 level use two-tailed test ( Î±2 =.05 )
